meta.job_title: Quality Assurance and Quality Control Analyst

duties_responsibilities.duty: Review data submitted by various programs (Reimbursement, Homeowner Assistance, and Buyout) to ensure compliance with program guidelines and applicable government regulations.
Generate weekly reports and ensure accurate input of data and documents into the system.
Identify problems and offer resolutions for improving data accuracy and compliance.
Monitor quality assurance and control activities for accurate information regarding the Disaster Recovery Team's financial draw packets.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required; Associate degree preferred
